hero.title: creating interactive courses
hero.subtitle: Create interactive courses and earn money on our marketplace. It's easier and faster than producing videos. We only charge you a small comission fee. It's risk-free.

waiting.title: Start earning from day one
waiting.subtitle: You’ll be notified before our launch. This means only creators who joined the waiting list will have courses available during our launch. We won’t spam you. We’ll use your email address only to notify you when we’re accepting creators into the platform.
waiting.success: Thank you! We'll notify you can start creating courses.
waiting.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

home.title: Wisek: Earn money with interactive courses
home.description: Tool for creating interactive courses that you can sell online and earn money.
